{{disambig-more: During the time of Denethor’s rule the [[Watchful Peace]] came to an end (in {{TA
Denethor: 2460}}) when [[Sauron]] returned with increased strength to [[Dol Guldur]].<ref>{{App
[[Denethor (disambiguation)]]}}: TA}}</ref>  Unbeknownst to Gondor, the lords of [[Minas Morgul]] had secretly bred a fell race of black Orcs, the [[Uruk-hai]], and in {{TA
column4: 2475}} these creatures assailed and overran [[Ithilien]].  Although they captured [[Osgiliath]] and destroyed the great stone-bridge, Denethor’s son, [[Boromir (Steward of Gondor)
column5: Boromir]], defeated the host of Morgul and regained Ithilien.  However, from that time on no people dwelt in that region, and for Gondor there was never full peace again until after the defeat of Sauron.<ref>{{App

{{disambig-more: Denethor I ruled as Steward for forty-two years, and was succeeded by his son Boromir.<ref name="South"/>
